title: Price predictions 10/20: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, SOL, DOGE, ADA, HYPE
contentSnippet: Bitcoin staged a rebound rally to $111,705 as the market recovers from last the recent catastrophic sell-off, but data suggests sellers will continue to take profit at each breakout top.

title: Monad’s Fast EVM Chain Promises ‘Night and Day’ Performance Gains
contentSnippet: CoinDesk sat down with Monad Foundation’s Head of Growth Kevin McCordic to talk about the architecture behind the blockchain.

title: Dogecoin price set for 25% jump after Elon Musk’s new cryptic DOGE post
contentSnippet: Musk’s tweets ignited DOGE’s meteoric 2021 rally, and with bullish signals returning, the memecoin might be gearing up again.

title: Ripple Backs Crypto Treasury That's Raising Over $1 Billion to Buy XRP
contentSnippet: Evernorth is raising more than $1 billion to buy up XRP, with backing from Ripple and support from the firm's executives.

title: Tom Lee's BitMine Shares Pump After Buying the Ethereum Dip
contentSnippet: The Ethereum treasury last week bought over 200,000 ETH.

title: Ripple-linked Evernorth to go public in $1B SPAC to build massive XRP treasury
contentSnippet: The move could make Evernorth one of the first public companies to anchor its balance sheet in XRP, signaling growing institutional appetite for digital assets.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Funds Lost $513 Million Last Week
contentSnippet: Bitcoin funds shed nearly $1 billion after tariff-driven crash, but dip-buyers rotated into Ethereum, Solana, and XRP as European investors stepped in.

title: Not Just Dogecoin: Elon Musk Pumps Floki Meme Coin Price With AI Shiba Inu Video
contentSnippet: Ethereum meme coin Floki spiked in price Monday after Elon Musk shared an AI video of his dog, echoing past Dogecoin pumps.

title: Solana founder brews up new perp DEX ‘Percolator’
contentSnippet: The plans for the new perpetual DEX come two months after a VanEck report highlighted Hyperliquid’s growth on the expense of Solana and other large chains.

title: Strategy Notches Third Smallest Bitcoin Purchase in 2025
contentSnippet: The Bitcoin-buying firm hasn’t issued common shares this month, leaving its main source of funding untapped.

title: Quantum Computing Is 'Biggest Risk to Bitcoin,' Says Coin Metrics Co-Founder
contentSnippet: Nic Carter says quantum computing is bitcoin’s biggest risk, explaining how spending exposes public keys and urging developers to plan post-quantum defenses.

title: How to read crypto charts in 2025 (even if you’re a beginner)
contentSnippet: Patterns, tools and indicators are key to making smarter crypto trading decisions. They help you spot trends and anticipate market moves with better insight.

title: Coinbase One Card Opens Up to American Users With Bitcoin Rewards
contentSnippet: American crypto exchange Coinbase is ending the waitlist for its Bitcoin rewards credit card, the Coinbase One Card.

title: Bolivia’s new president backs blockchain to tackle government corruption
contentSnippet: Bolivian President-elect Rodrigo Paz plans to use blockchain for public procurement and include crypto in asset declarations for a new fund.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Coinbase, Robinhood Go Down for Hours Amid Widespread AWS Outage
contentSnippet: A large-scale Amazon Web Services outage Monday led to downtime for both Coinbase and Robinhood, yielding complaints from users.

title: Ripple-Backed Firm Plans SPAC, Raising $1B to 'Create the Largest Public XRP Treasury'
contentSnippet: A new Ripple-backed public vehicle is planned to buy XRP on the open market and pursue yield strategies.

title: Bitcoin Miner Bitdeer's AI Pivot Earns Price Target Hike at Benchmark
contentSnippet: The company's move to bring data center development in-house strengthens its AI and mining strategy, and accelerates monetization, said analyst Mark Palmer

title: Blockchain.com Has Held Talks to Go Public Via SPAC Deal: Sources
contentSnippet: The crypto trading platform and wallet provider is being advised by Cohen & Company Capital Markets, according to a person familiar wih the matter.

title: Tom Lee's Bitmine Immersion Adds $800M of Ether, Bringing ETH Holdings Over $13B
contentSnippet: The digital asset treasury bubble might have burst, as chairman Thomas Lee said, but the firm added over $1.6 billion worth of ETH during the crypto correction.

title: CleanSpark Joins AI Rush in Expansion Beyond Bitcoin Mining
contentSnippet: The company hired industry veteran Jeffrey Thomas to lead new AI data center division.

title: Michael Saylor’s Strategy takes another small step toward 700K Bitcoin
contentSnippet: After its latest modest purchase, Michael Saylor’s Strategy has 59,582 BTC to go before hitting 700,000 BTC on its balance sheet.

title: New film ‘Code is Law’ explores moral quandary behind crypto hacks
contentSnippet: James Craig and Louis Giles’ new film “Code Is Law” examines infamous crypto hacks and the moral reckoning used by the perpetrators.

title: Decentralized science will bring the brain onchain
contentSnippet: Brain-computer interfaces like Neuralink concentrate mental control in corporate hands. Decentralized science offers shared governance over neural data.

title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Chainlink (LINK) Surges 16.6%, Leading Index Higher
contentSnippet: Aave (AAVE) was also a top performer, rising 13.7% as all index constituents trade higher over the weekend.

title: Bitcoin Mining Profitability Declined More Than 7% in September: Jefferies
contentSnippet: Bitcoin mining margins tightened in September as a rising network hashrate and a slide in BTC prices dragged profitability lower

title: BlackRock Launches Bitcoin ETP for UK Retail Investors
contentSnippet: The iShares Bitcoin ETP listing is BlackRock's first crypto product available to UK retail investors, via the London Stock Exchange.

title: Gemini Unveils Solana Credit Card That Pays and Auto-Stakes SOL Rewards
contentSnippet: Gemini is expanding its crypto credit card offerings with the release of the Solana Card, which will offer an auto-staking option.

title: Crypto Exchange Gemini Launches Solana-Themed Credit Card With Auto-Staking Rewards
contentSnippet: The new Solana edition of the Gemini Credit Card lets users earn up to 4% back in SOL and auto-stake rewards for extra yield.

title: Morning Minute: OpenSea Says SEA Is Coming Q1 2026
contentSnippet: Devin Finzer shared new details about OpenSea's upcoming SEA token, which both 2021 NFT traders and current users will want to hear about.

title: FRB、21日開催の暗号資産・決済会議の詳細を公表　サークル・コインベースら登壇へ
contentSnippet: 米FRBは10月21日開催の「Payments Innovation Conference」詳細を公表。ChainlinkやCircle、Coinbaseなど暗号資産関連企業が登壇予定。

title: AIフュージョンキャピタル、ビットコインを追加購入　保有量30 BTCに
contentSnippet: AIフュージョンキャピタルグループは10月、約1億円分（6.13BTC）のビットコインを追加購入。累計購入額は約4億円、保有量は30.76BTC（時価約5億円）に到達。BitGoや博報堂と連携し、暗号資産運用を拡大している。

title: コンヴァノ、ビットコイン売買で7億円の利益確保　ディーリング戦略で保有BTC拡大
contentSnippet: コンヴァノ（6574）はBTC高値売却・安値買戻しのトレーディング戦略で約7億円の利益を確保。保有量は665BTCに増加し、累計投資額は約114億円へ拡大。

title: NY市長選クオモ候補、仮想通貨振興へ新ポスト創設を公約
contentSnippet: ニューヨーク市長選候補のクオモ氏が暗号資産振興へ新ポスト創設を公約。最高技術革新責任者とイノベーション評議会を設置し、AI・ブロックチェーン・バイオテクノロジーの3分野で市を先導する方針を表明。ウォール街を擁するニューヨークの暗号資産政策に注目集まる。

title: 仮想通貨マイナー株価、ビットコイン上回る上昇　AIシフト背景に
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨マイニング企業のパフォーマンスが年初来2.5倍超上昇しビットコインを上回っている。アイリスエナジーやサイファーマイニングなどAI・HPC事業への転換が株価上昇の背景だ。

title: 中国IT大手、当局介入でステーブルコイン計画を中断＝FT紙
contentSnippet: 中国政府が複数のテック大手による香港でのステーブルコイン発行計画に介入。人民銀行は民間通貨発行やデジタル人民元への影響を懸念。香港は5月に世界初の包括的規制を施行したばかり。

title: 仮想通貨トレジャリー企業の”錬金術”時代は終焉か＝10x Research見解
contentSnippet: 10x Researchが仮想通貨トレジャリー企業のNAV暴落を分析した。ストラテジーやメタプラネットなどのDATは新たなビットコイン戦略への転換を迫られていると解説している。

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、ビットコイン市場回復の鍵やリップル社の事業拡大など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、BNB、XRPなどの主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: 金融庁、銀行の仮想通貨投資解禁を検討＝報道
contentSnippet: 金融庁が銀行によるビットコインなど仮想通貨の投資目的での取得・保有を可能にする制度改正を検討しているようだ。銀行グループの仮想通貨交換業者登録も可能にし、個人投資家の環境整備を図る。

title: 週刊仮想通貨ニュース｜バイナンスのユーザーへの救済金配布やメタプラネットの企業価値指標低下に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、トランプ・ショックを受けた仮想通貨取引所バイナンスによるユーザー補償、メタプラネットの企業価値指標mNAVの低下に関する記事が最も関心を集めた。
